Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>め……必ず、必ずクレアを……
Entry.EnglishText: That damned <Blue>Royal Shield<White>... Claire... I'm going to save you for sure...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、冷静になれ。 我を失えば、ヤツらに出し抜かれるだけだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Calm down, <Veigue>. They'll get the best of you if you lose your temper.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうそう、もっとリラックスして！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, yeah, you gotta relax more!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>、おまえはもっと気を引き締めていけ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>, you need to take things more seriously.

Entry.JapaneseText: ふふふ、<Eugene>って みんなのお父さんみたい♪
Entry.EnglishText: Heheh... <Eugene>'s acting like he's our dad♪
